3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Perfectly positioned on a quiet street, 264 3rd Ave features three bedrooms, two full baths, and approx. 2,050 sqft. At the front of the home is the dining room complete with the original brick fireplace, decorative paneling, and a window bench. Across the foyer rests the living room which overlooks the deck/garden below and opens directly into the kitchen. The beautifully remodeled kitchen features a gas range with pot filler, a farmhouse sink, shaker cabinetry, counter-top seating, and incredible storage. Just off of the kitchen is direct access to the large deck and yard, allowing for easy indoor-outdoor entertaining. Completing the main level is a contemporary split bath with a separate shower and soaking tub. The upper level of the home boasts three spacious bedrooms, a remodeled split bath with a walk-in shower, and a linen closet. The garage has interior access and offers parking for two-cars, laundry, and incredible storage space. Ideally located right off of the Clement Street corridor with access to incredible restaurants/shops, the Sunday farmer's market, the Presidio National Park, Mountain Lake Park, and Laurel Village.
Confidential Remarks: *Trust sale. Property has been in the same family for approximately 70 years. **We have multiple square footage measurements. Buyer is advised to investigate to their own satisfaction. Tax Records: 2,050 sqft and Graphic Artist: 2,030 sqft.
Directions to Property: On 3rd Ave between Clement St & Cornwall St.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This condo feels like the single-family home you have been looking for. With a renovation completed in September 2022, you are invited to fall in love with the details and see why the property feels like a stand-alone home. The downstairs walks out to the deeded backyard you are able to call your own. The kitchen was created to blend form and function with custom cabinets and a Thermador suite of appliances. Separate living and dining areas lend enough room for privacy, while the design of partially open walls gives itself a relaxed, open feel. A private patio off the dining room is a unique touch crafted with the idea of making the outside flow in. Not to be outdone, the primary suite is immense, with a flexible seating area. Considerable second and third bedrooms with a family room and laundry area are welcome additions to an already superior layout. From an ideal design to sophisticated finishes, this is a house crafted for those who want more.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on one of the loveliest blocks in all of Presidio Heights, this lower (of two units) house-like condo has three bedrooms, one and a half baths, and an exquisite, lush deeded yard. The recently remodeled eat-in kitchen comes with spacious counters, beautifully crafted cabinets and loads of storage. It's a cook's dream space. The formal dining room is elegant and roomy while the living room is cozy with special period details. Plenty of original details speak to the building's 1913 construction: hardwood floors, high ceilings, moulding, multiple fireplaces and more. The garage offers one-car parking (tandem) and significant storage - and expansion potential - as well. Steps to the Presidio, Presidio Wall playground, Laurel Village and the chic trappings of Sacramento Street, this is an extraordinarily unique opportunity in an equally extraordinary location.
Confidential Remarks: This condo is one of two available for sale (the upper unit, 3629 Jackson, is available for $3,900,000). *Floor plan measures this unit at 1840sf*

Confidential Remarks: Vacant! Show anytime! Call or text for additional questions: 650-888-0153. Offers due Tuesday, 1/23 @ 1PM. Disclosure link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/339-Willits-Street-7fg2u7gq
Public Remarks: Welcome to 55 Loraine Court a stunning & original 3 bedroom, 2 bath light-filled home located in a quiet cul-de-sac in Lone Mountain. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by an open-concept living area w large windows that let in ample natural light. Living room is complete with a fireplace and leads into the formal dining room. Kitchen is the perfect canvas for those looking to create their dream kitchen! Two bedrooms w sizable closets and balcony access overlooking the backyard. Bathroom includes separate stall shower and bathtub. Bonus finished basement complete with full bathroom. Enjoy your private backyard-perfect for summer barbecues and harvest your own fruits. Attached one car garage with plenty of storage space. The home is conveniently located between the Presidio and Golden Gate Park. It is also steps away from Rossi Park which feat basketball courts, baseball & soccer fields, playground and indoor swimming pool. Blocks from Arsicault Bakery, Burma Superstar, Cinderella Bakery!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Stunning modern residence in an impressive 3-unit building in desirable Lone Mountain. Lovingly cared for by its long-time owner and meticulously renovated in 2024, this full-floor condo offers incredible scale, a pragmatic floor plan and clean-line finishes. Open living and dining room flows seamlessly to a modern kitchen with induction cooktop, quartz countertops and custom cabinetry. Three light-filled bedrooms including an oversized primary bedroom with ensuite bathroom. Two modern bathrooms with designer fixtures. Beautiful wood floors, in-unit laundry, brand-new windows, updated electrical and plumbing. Two private balconies, a shared garden, spacious garage parking and abundant storage. Steps to wonderful neighborhood amenities: world-class parks, playgrounds, restaurants and the newly approved Whole Foods. Move right in and enjoy the best of city living.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on one of the best, flat blocks in Presidio Heights - this stately home is a generational opportunity. Designed by noted architect, Newton Tharp and built in 1910, the facade has many details common to the Tudor period and features a lovely front patio area and secure, gated, entrance. The main floor features generous public rooms with a pretty foyer, large formal living room with wood burning fireplace, formal dining room and sunny kitchen opening to a den and walk-out south garden. There is a sweet butler's pantry and utility room or home work space also with outlooks to the garden. The upstairs bedroom level enjoys a primary bedroom with en-suite bath and 2 additional bedrooms with a hall bath. There is an additional 840 square feet (per graphic artist) of lower level space for future development within the envelope. The home has recently been painted throughout the interior and exterior and has a new roof. Laundry is located on the lower level with access from the kitchen. Enjoy the best of Presidio Heights living with easy access to the Presidio, Laurel Village, fun shopping and dining on Sacramento. Neighborhood favorites including Spruce, Garibaldi's and As Quoted are just a few blocks away.
Confidential Remarks: Pre-escrow open with Kelley Kish @ First American. New roof completed in January. Offers due Tuesday (4/23) at 2 PM.

Great entertaining space with large front windows bringing in the South facing sunlight, a gas fireplace, and a Chef's kitchen w/custom European cabinets, Bosch stainless steel appliances, quartz tops, and pendant lighting. Spacious primary bedroom with a large en-suite and private deck. In-unit washer/dryer Radiant Heating. Nest Thermostats. Extra Storage. Great location! Across the street from MUNI and Golden Gate Park. Walk to Geary, Haight , NOPA, USF, Dignity Health, restaurants, and shops. 1 car off-site garage parking available! Low HOA.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: List price is minimum purchase price at Probate Court hearing. Probate Court Hearing is set for 11/21/23 at 9am. Three level Edwardian building on Lake Street, two blocks from Presidio Heights. Situated on a deep lot, this grand residence features a TOP FLOOR WITH THREE BEDROOMS & full bath, a main level with formal rooms and updated kitchen and a lower level with a private entrance and direct yard access. The light-filled living room has a gas fireplace with built-in shelves, coved ceilings and VIEWS OF TWIN PEAKS. The formal dining room features bay windows that overlook the garden. The RECENTLY REMODELED KITCHEN has an abundance of Shaker Style cabinets, granite counters, subway backsplash and adjacent laundry closet. The top level includes a primary bedroom with views of Twin Peaks, 2 other bedrooms (1 with fireplace) and a split bath with shower over tub. The lower level includes a formal living & dining room, kitchen and bedroom. The rear yard is level, deep and has a tradesman entrance. Close to Clement Street and Laurel Village shops and eateries and walking distance of the historic Presidio.
Confidential Remarks: VACANT BUILDING with SUPRA lockbox show 24/7. $2,000,750 is the MINIMUM opening bid at Probate Court Hearing. Probate Court Hearing 11/21/23 at 9:00 am -400 McAllister Street Room 204. All overbidders must attend hearing in order to bid. Sale is NON CONTINGENT and AS IS, 30 day escrow close. All terms non-negotiable and if buyer does not perform then 10% mandatory cashier's check will be forfeit. All disclosure requests by EMAIL ONLY. Buyer must sign and submit ALL SELLER provided ADDENDA and disclosures. This is a PROBATE COURT confirmation sale. All buyers must have and show a 10% deposit cashier's check made payable to Old Republic Title Company, 2566 Ocean Ave, Officer Christine Lim in order to bid at court hearing. Commission to be split 50/50 with successful bidding broker only at close of escrow.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to a lovely, modern, move-in ready home in the coveted Laurel Heights neighborhood! The welcoming open floor plan boasts an inviting great room with gas fireplace, designer kitchen with quartz counters, spacious island and stainless steel appliances, elegant dining area, 4 bedrooms and 3 baths, 1 car garage, and a deep flat yard surrounded by trees and perfect for playtime. The epitome of style and function, having undergone a major renovation that was completed in 2014, there is nothing to do but move right in and enjoy the best of city living. The close proximity to a multitude of hip cafes & restaurants, Clement St. Farmers Market, Laurel Village, the JCC, Trader Joe's, parks, playgrounds, and schools, creates the perfect urban lifestyle. It is easy to escape from the hustle and bustle by relaxing in the verdant backyard or fire up the BBQ and entertain with friends on the two decks. Wood floors, recessed lights, Nest system, washer/dryer, double pane windows, Tesla EV charger, and ample closets further enhance this city gem!
Confidential Remarks: See www.683spruce.com for floor plan; also attached to MLS under documents and in DP. Pre-sale escrow opened with Kelley Kish at FATCO, #6969416. MLS post from 2016 indicates 2100 square feet per the previous owner; seller has not had the home measured and neither seller nor agent verify the square footage. Buyer to verify to their satisfaction. For offers, please use SFAR purchase agreement and submit proof of funds and fully signed DP. Seller reserves the right to accept, reject or counter any offer.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Gorgeous Presidio Heights top-floor condo drenched in natural light, period details and modern updates, this unit showcases southern views of Sutro Tower and features a privately accessed garage with plentiful storage. The unit has a flexible layout that can comfortably live as 2 bedroom with an abundance of living and entertainment space, or transform into a 3 bedroom for extra utility. A proper owner's suite features a walk-through closet and private bathroom while a split bathroom serves the rest of the home. The kitchen has been modernized in a period style with gray cabinetry, marble countertops and new appliances. A private laundry room is centrally located within the unit. Traditional details throughout the home includes two fireplaces, decorative moldings, softwood floors and period lighting. Conveniently located in the heart of Presidio Heights retail corridor, walk a mere minute to Presidio shopping, dining, and only a few additional blocks to one of the country's most prized National Parks, The Presidio. Lovely 3 unit building with low HOA dues.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience the epitome of contemporary design in this meticulously updated 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo. Built in 1946, this striking home includes a myriad of distinctive features: from open-concept kitchen & dining room, hardwood floors, elegant entryways, marble & tiled baths, & designer fixtures. The renovated chef's kitchen is attractively appointed with shaker cabinets, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, & tile backsplash. The building is detached on 3 sides allowing for an abundance of light from the open kitchen & dining room to flow seamlessly to the living room with an adjacent Juliet Balcony & wood-burning fireplace. Down the hall, you will find both bedrooms overlooking the tranquil, shared garden. Stunning primary bedroom features an ensuite bathroom with a shower stall and walk-in closet. Dine al-fresco in the beautiful garden setting of the expansive shared yard. With a 2nd bath off the hallway & an in-unit washer & dryer, this condo is remarkable. Located near USF & Koret, this Lone Mountain location has a unique vibe. Walking distance to bustling thoroughfares with shopping & dining including Laurel Village & Whole Foods. Close to open green spaces including Rossi, Jordan & Golden Gate Park, this distinct SF neighborhood offers a dynamic living experience
Confidential Remarks: Property website: www.124Beaumont.com DO NOT BOOK through SHOWINGTIME! Please call/text Tyron at (415) 728-2294 for more information or to schedule an appointment. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on a flat block in the illustrious Presidio Heights neighborhood, 3485 Jackson Street stands as a testament to architectural grandeur and refined living. The black & white tiled entry leads up to a grand-scale foyer opening to gracious living spaces w/ soaring ceilings & warm hardwood floors. The formal living room & marble fireplace reflect grace & sophistication; the formal dining room has garden outlooks & ample room for entertaining. An adjacent relaxing sitting room is just off the kitchen, which is outfitted w/ stainless steel counters & teak cabinetry. The sitting room & kitchen both access the flat, S-facing Thomas Church deck & garden. A sky-lit main staircase leads to verdant & serene private quarters. The spacious primary suite feat. leather floors, a marble fireplace, multiple windows, walk-through closet w/ skylight & en-suite bath w/ marble vanity. 3 addt'l bedrooms & a full bath afford ample space for family & guests. The bedrooms at the rear of the home access a sunny, S-facing balcony. The lower level offers a home gym w/ garden access & adjacent office w/ built-in bookshelves & a full bath. A laundry rm & garage w/ extra storage complete the interior. Outside, multiple sitting areas offer a serene retreat, all in a premier Presidio Hts location.
Confidential Remarks: Floor plans show 3,290, which includes 345 sq ft for staged areas on garage level where legality is unknown. Full lower level excluding garage space shows 625 sq ft.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Prime Lone Mountain! In a 2-unit building on a beautiful block, this stunning remodeled condo offers a phenomenal, landscaped deeded garden & fabulous walk-out multiple decks! Offering a quiet & serene setting. Perfect for entertaining, gardening, dog lovers & child's play. There is also a delightful permitted room & bath off the garage that opens to the garden. All the rooms are spacious & offer shimmering hardwood floors, & beautiful architectural detailing including crown & plaster moldings. The living room with fireplace is light-filled & opens to the elegant dining room. The dining room flows flawlessly to the open modern kitchen & breakfast room with dramatic skylight! This fabulous central location is steps away from USF & the Koret Health & Recreation Center, Rossi Park & Playground, steps to Golden Gate Park, & close to the Presidio & all the fabulous trails & amenities it has to offer. Walking distance to transportation, great restaurants, schools, & shops!
Confidential Remarks: There is a fabulous deeded room and bath off the garage that is perfect for a home office, gym, or art studio. This room is included in the quoted square footage and it measures approximately 195 sqft. On a premium block and great location this condo is located on a picturesque tree-lined block surrounded by beautiful homes, showcasing the lovely architecture from the era in which they were built. Easy to show at any time. Call, text or email Robert at 415-748-1481 or robert@callansf.com or Barbara at 415-806-7906 or barbara@callansf.com for appointment.

Steps to wonderful neighborhood amenities: world-class parks, restaurants and the coming-soon Whole Foods. Move right in and enjoy the best of city living.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Contemporary meets Old World Charm in this 3,400 sf home, custom built in 2006. 11 ft ceilings, well appointed kitchen w/deck & yard access plus a family friendly floor plan make this home worth checking out. Enormous primary suite + 2 beds/2 baths on 2nd floor. Garden level has add'l living space incl 1 bd/ba and fully equipped kitchen (unwarranted). Gardeners and kids alike will appreciate the yard w/fruit trees, accessible from kitchen, primary bedroom and garden level rooms. Deep & wide garage will accommodate cars, bikes, scooters & camping equipment! You won't want to miss this unique offering on the north side of town with a Walk Score of 96. Laurel Village, tony shops on Sacramento St and easy access to downtown are at your door step!
Confidential Remarks: Clients are 99% moved out but still operate a business in SF. Will fully vacate when in escrow. Please call/text 415.317.1168 for any private showings outside of open houses. Disclosures available: https://app-glide.compass.com/share/2tjQs2XbztiWEPzGXiQiN7/

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome home to this sweet, newly updated top-floor residence in the midst of all the action in Inner Richmond! Live large in this spacious flat that features a great layout, the living room flows to the dining area, and updated kitchen with gorgeous new countertops and high-end appliances. The home boasts a roomy bedroom with generous closets and a newly refreshed bath. Other amenities include a generous and charming, Eastern-facing landscaped garden, and 1 car parking. A+ location within moments of all that Clement and Geary have to offer - boutique shopping, cafes, artisanal coffee shops, craft cocktail bars, the farmer's market, parks, and more.
Confidential Remarks: Please EMAIL theswanngroup@compass.com for showing requests. Please do not book an appointment through Showing Time. All offers to be submitted on a San Francisco Purchase Agreement with TIC Addendum. If you do not have access to this document, kindly let us know and we can provide one for you.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Discover the charm and convenience of city living in this spacious TIC located in the heart of San Francisco. Nestled on a picturesque corner lot in a vibrant neighborhood, this 3 bed/1.5 bath home is flooded with natural light. With beautiful hardwood floors throughout, the layout of this home creates a natural separation between the bedrooms and entertaining space. Perfect for hosting, the bright and airy living room features a fireplace, crown molding, and large windows on two sides of the room. A light-filled formal dining room and recently remodeled kitchen complete the living space. Down a hallway you'll find 3 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms. A serene private patio and direct access to an ensuite bathroom make the primary bedroom an ideal spot to unwind after a long day. A large front driveway allows for 2 car tandem parking with 1 spot in the garage and 1 in the driveway. With a high Walk Score of 93, enjoy all the shopping, dining, and entertainment options on Clement St, or take advantage of the Rossi Recreation Center, pool, and tennis courts just across the street.
Confidential Remarks: Go and show! Offer Date Tue 2/14/23 11am, see Disclosure Coversheet for offer instructions- HOA for unit 4 is $313 (Building Insurance/reserves)+ Operating expenses +/- $170 (water, trash, and common PG&E). Pre- Escrow opened with Yvette Gonzalez @ ORTC. Seller reserves the right to accept, counter, or refuse any offers. Buyer agrees to cooperate in sellers 1031 exchange at no cost, expense or liability to Buyer. Link to Disclosures: https://app.disclosures.io/link/4-Rossi-Avenue-l4jg99vx

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located in the highly coveted Jordan Park neighborhood, this rarely available Marina Style full floor flat features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Built in 1928 the flat has been nicely updated yet maintains much of its original charm including refinished hardwood floors, period molding, elaborate stone and tile fireplace and built kitchen hutch. 475 Euclid includes in-unit laundry, shared backyard, a large, 2 car (buyer to verify) independent parking area, as well as a large, exclusive storage/bonus room with window onto the yard that could potentially be finished into an amazing future office, gym or even guest room (buyer to verify). Whether you are buying your daily groceries in Laurel Village or planning a farm to table Sunday feast at the Clement St farmers market, 475 Euclid features walkability to amazing local amenities. Enjoy local shopping and dining on Sacramento St. and Clement or hop on one of several nearby bus lines to explore the city. Laurel Hill Playground is just up the street and is a favorite among local families. 475 Euclid is being offered as a Tenancy in Common (TIC) in a two unit building with no buyout/eviction history on record with the city. Property is believed to be eligible for quick conversion to condo (Buyer to verify).
Confidential Remarks: Disclosures available upon request. Buyer advised to test & verify 2 car parking. Buyer to verify ability to convert storage room to livable space. Neither seller nor listing agent make any representation to the convertibility of the property to condos. Buyer to investigate condo conversion potential and process to their own satisfaction. Sirkin TIC Agreement and Map can be found in disclosures. Fractional financing available through Redwood Credit Union. HOA will be formed after COE and monthly dues are estimate from Seller (see disclosures).

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Video Preview! Beautiful, fully-detached home on a quiet cul de sac in the center of the city. Across Anza Street from Rossi Park, Playground, Tennis Courts and Pool. Excellent Public Transportation. 1936 construction with significant upgrades: Roof, Kitchen, Bath, electrical, sewer lateral, furnace, & water heater. Dramatic Living Room showcases vaulted ceiling, leaded glass windows, parquet floors, moldings, & fireplace. Formal Dining Room. Breakfast Room. Updated Kitchen. Large office with closet could be used as the 3rd bedroom. The large above grade garage & garden level offers easy & great potential.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This Presidio Heights residence will feel like home instantly as it will embrace you when you enter with beautiful details throughout, offering you true San Francisco charm. With 4 BDRs & 2 & 1/2 Baths, it offers versatility for your lifestyle. Upon entering, the foyer will lead you into the front-facing living room featuring expansive windows that flood the space w/ light, while a cozy fireplace beckons you to unwind. The adjacent dining room w/ stylish built-in cabinets & a decorative fireplace seamlessly flows into the kitchen, equipped w/ top-of-the-line SS appliances fit for the chef in the house and ideal for entertaining. A hallway enhanced w/ elegant wainscoting guides you to the rear BDRs, ensuring privacy & tranquility. The primary BDR w/ an ensuite & walk-in closet has direct access to a charming outdoor area, exclusive to this residence. An adjacent BDR features a large glass door slider that opens onto the beautifully landscaped garden & hot tub. A third bedroom offers serene views of mature trees, creating a peaceful ambiance, while the fourth bedroom can additionally cater to your office needs. To complete this unit are 2 assigned storage rooms, a lg, shared storage

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Set on one of Presidio Heights most distinguished blocks, this impressive five-level home is designed for relaxed living with classic San Francisco charm. Framed by the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and the grandeur of the Presidio, enchanting outlooks can be seen from nearly every window. The charming brick entry leads to the stately entrance and foyer where the home's architectural detail and grand staircase are a warm welcome. The living room with wood-burning fireplace invites intimate gatherings. The dining room's old world charm leads to the heart of the home, the bright and expansive kitchen with views of the Golden Gate Bridge. This dreamy kitchen includes a seating area, breakfast nook, large island, two ovens, two dishwashers, two sinks, a Sub-Zero fridge, wet bar, walk-in pantry, desk nook and a balcony with a built-in barbeque. The second level boasts four bedrooms and a precious sunroom. The third level offers a spectacular primary suite with Golden Gate Bridge views, an office and lounge area. From the kitchen, stairs lead to a lower level with media room, laundry and large 2-car garage. The lowest level has a versatile gym with direct access to the garden and a zen-like
Confidential Remarks: All showings are by appointment only; no public open houses will be held. Buyers are advised to investigate square footage measurements to their satisfaction. The entry and dining fixtures are excluded from the sale but can be purchased from Mark Lopez Design. Escrow open with Kelley Kish of First American Title.
Public Remarks: Set on one of Presidio Heights most distinguished blocks, this impressive five-level home is designed for relaxed living with classic San Francisco charm. This dreamy kitchen includes a seating area, breakfast nook, large island, two ovens, two dishwashers, two sinks, a Sub-Zero fridge, wet bar, walk-in pantry, desk nook and a balcony with a built-in barbeque. The second level boasts four bedrooms and a precious sunroom. The third level offers a spectacular primary suite with Golden Gate Bridge views, an office and lounge area. From the kitchen, stairs lead to a lower level with media room, laundry and large 2-car garage. The lowest level has a versatile gym with direct access to the garden and a zen-like spa. This special home offers cherished spaces to enjoy life's precious moments.
